definition: male/staminate/grand/imposing/powerful/mighty/person or state having great power and influence

sentences.english: In Defiance you are playing the Indie Side of the conflict.
sentences.chinese: 在《星海梟雄》中，你則扮演戰爭中獨立印地的一方。

sentences.english: First of all, as a fierce and ambitious generation of Liu Bei, does not have military talent.
sentences.chinese: 首先，作爲一代梟雄的劉備，並不具有軍事上的才華。

definition: to call the wind and summon the rain (idiom); to exercise magical powers/fig. to stir up troubles
to triumph in every battle (idiom); invincible/to succeed in every undertaking
to have a highly retentive memory/to have sth imprinted in one's memory
to talk idly about important matters (idiom)/to set the world to rights/to pass judgment on everything
to meet with misfortune/to fall into dire straits
to take revenge for a past insult/to expunge a disgrace or humiliation
(of a person) valiant and formidable-looking/to carry oneself tall
venturing from one's thatched hut for the first time (idiom)/young and inexperienced/novice/greenhorn
lit. an old steed in the stable still aspires to gallop 1000 miles (idiom); fig. aged person with great aspirations
